channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: Bargain Hunt
channel.desc: Roo Irvine has a cuppa with royal memorabilia collector Paul Smith and learns about his rare souvenirs that are worth a pretty penny. Meanwhile, the teams are shopping at the Oswestry Showground. Sticking with the royal theme, friends Brad and Sam on the red team and their expert Philip Serrell are keen to snap up a Victorian silver miniature coronation throne. Taking them on in blue are mother and daughter Sarah and Kate with expert Ben Cooper, who are challenged to buy a brass or copper item.
